author: BluKorvyd
description: Listen to music in voice chat, now with improvements!
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Better Audio!
 You **MUST** load audio to use this (`[p]load audio`)
 Then you can get started with `[p]load audioxtend` and `[p]help audioxtend`
short: Listen to music in voice chat
end_user_data_statement:
This cog expands the core Audio cog without collecting any additional End User Data.
See the core End User Data storage for more information
